title: Yu3
description:
Yu3 is your one-stop solution for brand marketing, analytics, and tracking. In just a few short weeks, we’ve welcomed over 600 users to our platform, and together, we’ve facilitated more than 150,000 redirects! We’re just getting started, more to come!

🔗 Smart Links – Redirect users based on OS, location, and more. 
🔗 TrackIt Links – One Landing, multiple sources, track everything at one place! 
🏷️ QR Generator – Create dynamic, branded QR codes
🌐 Custom Domains
👤 Teams and Folders
